briefTitle: Effect of Wii-console Based Exercise on Shoulder Range of Motion for Post-mastectomy Lymphedema Patients
officialTitle: Effect of Wii-console Based Exercise on Shoulder Range of Motion for Post-mastectomy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All the patients will be females.
* Patients undergone mastectomy with lymph nodes dissection.
* all developed lymphedema after the surgery.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Vision problems.
* Medically instable patients.
* Balance disorders.
* Other musculoskeletal condition of shoulders.
